name: Battlerz
description:
Wanna be a Battler?  WELL NOWZ YOU CHANCE!

Itz time for you to become the Battler you've alwayz dreamed of being, choose from a rozter of three unique characterz and learn how to become the bezt 8 bit verzion of yourzelf you have ever wanted to be. 

Zelect your map, Grab a comrade and Chooze your character to become victoriouz over your enemiez.  Therez no time to loze Battler, get out there and ztart battling.

Well? What are you waiting for, download and play now!

Or Play On NewGrounds Now!!! 

https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/757344?updated=1591705136

Grampz:

Grampz has had a bad day today, cooking up a sweet BBQ at his nephews birthday party, when YOU decided you wanted to select him to Battle today, and he's not happy about it!

Wielding his trusty Spatula and flinging his iconic 7 sausage barrage, you better duck and cover from this nasty uncle. 

Emerzon:

After a long day of work Emerzon just wanted to go home and chill out, maybe even play some Hollow Knight, but then along comes you and selects him to be your battler, lets just say he's not too glad you chose him.

Armed with his lucky Water Gun and his armored turtle suit, he's ready to blast some enemies with Water, advised to hide in your shell from this bad motha trucker.

Razbo:

Razbo's had a long history of wars and fighting that we best not get into, however he's probably the only one happy that you chose him. hes always keen for a good battle.

Weaponized with his big bad Shotty, going up against this three shot collateral badass is not the best idea.
